00052   l4_umword_t spsr_fiq;

00098 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00099 l4_vm_run(l4_cap_idx_t vm) L4_NOTHROW;
00100 
00105 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00106 l4_vm_run_u(l4_cap_idx_t vm, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW;
00107 
00113 enum
00114 {
00115   L4_VM_RUN_OP    = 0    /* Run a VM */
00116 };
00117 
00118 
00119 /****** Implementations ****************/
00120 
00121 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00122 l4_vm_run_u(l4_cap_idx_t vm, l4_fpage_t const vm_state_fpage,
00123             l4_umword_t *label, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00124 {
00125   l4_msg_regs_t *r = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00126   r->mr[0] = L4_VM_RUN_OP;
00127   r->mr[1] = vm_state_fpage.raw;
00128   //r->mr[2] = *label;
00129 
00130   return l4_ipc(vm, u, L4_SYSF_CALL, *label, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 3, 0, 0), label, L4_IPC_NEVER);
00131 }
00132 
00133 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00134 l4_vm_run(l4_cap_idx_t vm, l4_fpage_t const vm_state_fpage,
00135           l4_umword_t *label) L4_NOTHROW
00136 {
00137   return l4_vm_run_u(vm, vm_state_fpage, label, l4_utcb());
00138 }
